info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The house was very cozy and nice, and it was equipped with essentials. However, it was difficult to find on the map, and more information could have been provided. That would have been very helpful for someone new to the area.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: My second time staying at this location, hope to stay here in the future. Great location, and very friendly and accomodating host. Definitely recommend.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: We stayed at this location for about three weeks during this time the cleaning/cooking lady, Kahadiza and the downstairs gentlemen were very helpful whenever we needed them. In the future when we’re in the area will look to see if this place is available to rent. Whenever we had an issue arise, they were quick to address it and make it as if nothing happened. They were wonderful people.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Best place to stay while in Dhaka!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Niketan as a location was great, with relatively easy access to the upmarket Gulshan/Banani area, as well as the northern and eastern parts of town. Plenty of eateries and shopping around the place. A mega Aarong handicrafts store is nearby.
The apartment itself was huge - frankly, it was too large for just one person! The big TV on the wall was great - especially for the football. Sofas in the living were large and very comfy. The apartment was very clean, the air-conditioning was perfect. Kitchen was well-stocked with pots and pans. The shower in the main bathroom worked perfectly, with running hot water. The bed and pillows weren't as comfy as one might expect.
Finally, Toufiqur, the manager was extremely helpful at check-in. Farooq the caretaker was always there to help out (including opening the gate late at night!)

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: A really good and quiet place that had all the things needed to feel at home - super good and stable internet...

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · May 2023
rating_comment:
This Airbnb served as our Launchpad as we relocated to Dhaka. Being walkable from my office I found this place comfortable and with a well equipped house - it was home away from home for our young family. Farooq the caretaker of the apartment is very helpful so is Taufiq the manager who provided support promptly.
The house would need a good deep clean (if you have children) but it’s absolutely liveable.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Amazing place and great service! I would recommend this house to anyone.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Everything was good, the Airbnb definitely has a lot of future potential. Would definitely recommend.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Everything was good .host was very helpful, u think price could be little bit less.

rating_comment: A modern spacious apartment in Niketan. Owner's rep was very helpful when the internet stopped working and the service reinstalled the same day. A deep cleaning is all the place needs

rating_comment: It was comfortable stay

rating_comment: The apartment was as advertised and worked great for our needs. Very happy with our experience.

rating_comment: Beautiful Airbnb, located in a perfect part of the city. Would recommend to anyone staying in Dhaka. Would definitely stay here again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This is our second time staying at this listing and it was just as amazing as the last time. Great location, very clean and one of the most caring hosts I’ve had the pleasure of meeting.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2022,  · Group trip
rating_comment: great place and host

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Perfect place for short and long stays, well maintained safe and secure place. You get access to everything you need near by.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Group trip
rating_comment: The place is very spacious and clean. The caretaker was very helpful and the location was perfect for us.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Everything was perfect and very good location. Staffs are helpful and it’s really worth of money.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The house facilities is excellent. I enjoyed my stay at the apartment and the caretaker were very helpful. I strongly recommend Abu apartment to anyone travelling to Dhaka either for work or pleasure and doesn't want to miss his or her home.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: It was great to stay at Abu’s place. The location is fantastic, and the entire neighborhood is clean and quiet. The maintenance folks are always ready to help. The apartment is spacious to live and host friends and family. We had a very comfortable living even in the middle of brutal Dhaka summer. I highly recommend this place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: The apartment was very modern with great facilities. It is in a great location with access to lots of restaurants and a shopping mall close by. Our host was nice and maintained great communication with us throughout the stay. Would love to stay here again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2022,  · Group trip
rating_comment: The apartment was beautiful and spacious. The owner guards and mr taufik were all well responsive and respectful. If youre looking for a place to stay in Dhaka for a few days this is the place.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · December 2021,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: We stayed at Abu’s place for 10 days. Overall, we are very satisfied with our stay. There were some initial maintenance issues but Abu and his local representative took care of them immediately. The location is very safe and the apartment gets a lot of natural light. We plan to stay again.
